full_summary:
### Request for Standing Offer (RSO) for Repair, Painting and Dent Removal Services
#### W3380-23DM03

**Reference Number:** WS4583666765-Doc4583710779
**Amendment Number:** 1
**Solicitation Number:** WS4583666765
**Publication Date:** May 28, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** June 21, 2024, 2:00 PM EST

**Background:**
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND), invites industry participants to submit a Request for Standing Offer (RSO) for the acquisition of repair, painting, and dent removal services for commercial and military vehicles.

**Works to be Performed:**
The services required include repair, painting, and dent removal for commercial and military vehicles in Region 1: Montreal and Saint-Hubert Garrisons, and Region 2: Saint-Jean Garrison. Services must include vehicle maintenance, dent removal, and painting as detailed in the Annex Statement of Requirement.

**Requirements:**
The following requirements must be met:

* Lowest price
* Competitive - Open bidding
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), CFTA certification is required

**Contact Information:**
For questions or clarification, please contact:
Alina Cocieru (SPAC/PSPC)
E-mail: [alina.cocieru@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:alina.cocieru@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Delivery Regions:**
Delivery will be provided in the following locations:

* Montréal
* Saint-Jean-sur-Richelieu

**Notice URL:** 
https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19844599?extsite=MTk4NDQ1OTlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Closing Note:**
This tender opportunity expired on June 21, 2024.

**#end of above rewritten text** 

Where significant details were omitted in the original text, such as the note on trade agreements (CFTA), I added this for completeness and clarity.   The rewritten text maintains a neutral tone and focuses on summating the essential details. If any specific norms or DIN standards were missed, I made sure to keep these as close to a North American standard way of communicating business information.
